CustomField.description: ** System Calculated Conditionally Required ** Link to the subscribing Account. Required if the Subscription "Subscribing Entity" is "Account". Defaults to the same Account assigned to the Sales Order Line that created the Subscription.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ** System Calculated Conditionally Required ** Link to the subscribing Account. Required if the Subscription "Subscribing Entity" is "Account". Defaults to the same Account assigned to the Sales Order Line that created the Subscription.
CustomField.label: Account
